.  A part of Gangetic Plains of north India, Sitamarhi is located around 50 km from
. The city and places around are very active culturally and politically but one of the poorest in India based on almost all social indicators.
Sitamarhi is well connected to other parts of India and Bihar through a network of railway lines and roads.

120 km away.  Patna airport is serviced by major domestic airlines like Indian, Jet Airways and Air Deccan. There are direct flights to Delhi, Kolkata, Lucknow, Kathmandu and Varanasi from Patna airport.

Sitamarhi is on the National Highway map of India with NH 77 connecting it with other parts of the country. There are buses every 15 minutes for

Most reliable and easily available local transport is cycle rickshaw. You can also get shared three-wheelers and buses from the railway and bus terminal. sitamarhi is a small city and you can easily walk around and see places of attraction.
